titleStmt.title: A declaration set forth by the lord lieutenant and councell for vindicating the honour and justice of His Majesties government and ministers heere, from severall foule and scandalous aspersions endeavoured to be layed upon them by Alice, Lady Moore, Viscountesse Dowager of Drogheda, Sir Patrick Wemys, knight, and Captaine Iohn Ponsonby, in severall letters (here also inserted) directed from the said persons to some persons in His Majesties kingdom of England.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1641-1649 : Ormonde)

titleStmt.title: A declaration set forth by the lord lieutenant and councell for vindicating the honour and justice of His Majesties government and ministers heere, from severall foule and scandalous aspersions endeavoured to be layed upon them by Alice, Lady Moore, Viscountesse Dowager of Drogheda, Sir Patrick Wemys, knight, and Captaine Iohn Ponsonby, in severall letters (here also inserted) directed from the said persons to some persons in His Majesties kingdom of England.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cashel Diocesan Library (Cashel, Ireland).

person.persName: Moore of Drogheda, Alice Moore, Dowager Countess,
